articles.title: Prince Harry told to explain missing messages in News Group Newspapers lawsuit - BBC.com
articles.description: The ruling is part of Prince Harry's lawsuit against the Sun publisher over claims of phone hacking.
articles.content:
By James Gregory, BBC News
The Duke of Sussex has been ordered by a High Court judge to explain why messages which might be relevant to his legal case against the publisher of the Sun have been dele… [+3001 chars]
